holidays.title: National Bulldogs Are Beautiful Day
holidays.description: French, American, or English — bulldogs portray glamour in their own special way.

holidays.title: Advisor Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Advisors are the backbone of the education sector, providing guidance and help to teachers.

holidays.title: Battle of San Jacinto
holidays.description: The victory at San Jacinto led to the Republic of Texas declaring its independence from Mexico.

holidays.title: Big Word Day
holidays.description: Raise your words, not your voice, by broadening your vocabulary with fancy words like ‘embourgeoisement!’

holidays.title: Festival of Ridvan
holidays.description: During these days of the Ridvàn festival, we are spreading holiness, love, and joy.

holidays.title: International Hemp Day
holidays.description: Learn the history, facts, and benefits of hemp as we celebrate International Hemp Day.

holidays.title: Keep Off the Grass Day
holidays.description: We’re learning all about lawns and how to keep off the grass.

holidays.title: National Alex Day
holidays.description: The name Alex has the Midas touch. This ancient Greek name is loved even today.

holidays.title: National Chickpea Day
holidays.description: Get your forks ready and dig into your chickpeas to celebrate this special day!

holidays.title: National Chocolate Covered Cashews Day
holidays.description: Get ready for a chocolaty, crunchy, nutty, and very sweet day with chocolate and cashews!

holidays.title: National Javier Day
holidays.description: Learn about Saint Xavier, who inspired the name, and others who inherited it.

holidays.title: National Kindergarten Day
holidays.description: Get out your crayons and flash cards — it's time for National Kindergarten Day!

holidays.title: National Pet CBD day
holidays.description: Learn about C.B.D. and its health benefits for your beloved pets.

holidays.title: National Surprise Drug Test Day
holidays.description: There's so much to learn and knowledge to share about drugs on National Surprise Drug Test Day.

holidays.title: National Tea Day
holidays.description: This love for tea dates back centuries and seems to only get stronger (pun intended)!

holidays.title: National Yellow Bat Day
holidays.description: The symbol of the 265th ASA is a bat with outstretched wings on a full moon.

holidays.title: San Jacinto Day
holidays.description: Do not miss celebrating San Jacinto Day. Everything you need to know is here!

holidays.title: Thank You for Libraries Day
holidays.description: Learn more about Thank You For Libraries Day and how you can celebrate.

holidays.title: Tiradentes Day
holidays.description: Brazilians recognize the martyrdom of Tiradentes every year on Tiradentes Day.

holidays.title: Tiradentes' Day
holidays.description: Brazilians will always cherish the memory of this national hero and revolutionary.

holidays.title: Tuna Rights Day
holidays.description: Read up to understand the basics of sustainable consumption this Tuna Rights Day.

holidays.title: World Creativity and Innovation Day
holidays.description: It’s the day to step outside the box, put on your thinking hat, and dream big!

holidays.title: World Curlew Day
holidays.description: Get ready to learn about these amazing birds and their importance to our ecosystem.

holidays.title: Elizabeth II’s Birthday
holidays.description: The ascension of the greatest and most famous British monarch that the world has ever known.

holidays.title: James McAvoy’s Birthday
holidays.description: This amazing actor has earned recognition as the crème de la crème of British acting talent.

holidays.title: Jessey Stevens’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young model and social media sensation has amassed a loyal fanbase. Discover why!

holidays.title: Lisa Frank’s Birthday
holidays.description: An entrepreneur of Lisa Frank’s stature creates quite an impression on many generations.

holidays.title: Robert Smith’s Birthday
holidays.description: Rock star Robert Smith sure knows how to keep the boat rocking.

holidays.title: Tony Romo’s Birthday
holidays.description: Displaying strength in the midst of pain, Tony Romo is an inspiration to us all.
